name: Zoho Vault
description: Password manager and digital vault for individuals and teams with secure password storage, sharing, auto-fill, emergency access, password generator, and multi-factor authentication

opengraph.title: Zoho Vault: Password Manager with Single Sign-On & MFA for Businesses, Teams & Families
opengraph.description: Zoho Vault is an online password manager that acts as a digital vault for your identities. Safely manage all your passwords & protect them from cyberthreats. Try for free. No credit card required.
opengraph.twitter_title: Zoho Vault: Password Manager with Single Sign-On & MFA for Businesses, Teams & Families
opengraph.twitter_description: Zoho Vault is an online password manager that acts as a digital vault for your identities. Safely manage all your passwords & protect them from cyberthreats. Try for free. No credit card required.
